attributes.action: Allow the sale of noise free fireworks only
attributes.additional_details: The noise that fireworks make is terrifying to many animals and to some vulnerable adults. Noise free fireworks are now readily available so there is no longer the need to cause this distress
attributes.background: To legislate to allow the sale of noise free fireworks only to the public

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
